document.full_text: tennessee's top investigator on monday made a public plea for leads in the apparent abduction of a 20-year-old nursing student holly bobo five days ago as more than 1,000 volunteers searched for her.
document.title: tennessee investigator makes plea for help in bobo case
lines_and_colors: tennessee's top investigator on monday made a public plea for leads in the apparent abduction of a 20-year-old nursing student holly bobo five days ago as more than 1,000 volunteers searched for her.
